title: Summer Art Camp! 5 Days of Artists and Painting Monet, Van Gogh, Matisse, & More
subtitle: Multi-Day Course
body: In this 5 day class we will explore artists Monet, Mafisse, Van Gogh, among others and then recreate paintings using crayon and watercolor. Students will have fun learning about artists & creating their own art inspired by their work.
author: Kimberly R Moseler
